name: Flaming Revolver
description: Invented by a mad scientist. With its impressive test numbers, one can only imagine how powerful it might be at full power.

skills.normal_des:
On the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row.
The first attack deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.
The second attack deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> damage.
The third attack deals <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> damage.
The fourth attack deals <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> damage.
The fifth attack deals <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> damage.
skills.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
skills.skill: Constant fire in a frontal cone area to deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
skills.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes <shuzhi>3</> grenades forward, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> AOE damage and causing <shuzhi>launch</>.
